column1: * 1915 - The Big Four of the T.C.B.S. - J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Christopher Wiseman and Robert Gilson - have their last meeting.

column1: * 1927 - Producer and interviewer Denys Gueroult is born.
* 1931 - Voice actor Peter Woodthorpe is born.
* 1977 - William Carter publishes "The filial duty of Christopher Tolkien" in Sunday Times Magazine.
* 1982 - Oxonmoot 1982 at the Cotswold Lodge Hotel.
* 1982 - The eleventh episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2010 - Lasse Lanta Autumn Meeting of the Austrian Tolkien Society.
** The Hobbits reach Farmer Maggots Bamfurlong in the afternoon; they meet Meriadoc Brandybuck near the Bucklebury Ferry and Crickhollow in the night.
** Frodo reveals them his plans but they are already known. In the night he dreams about the trees of the Old Forest.
